Hi and welcome!

This website gathers code and additional material for the paper [Causal Exaggeration: Unconfounded but Inflated Causal Estimates](causal_exaggeration_paper.pdf).

This paper **shows that the use of causal identification strategies induces a trade-off between two biases: avoiding confounding and exaggerating true effect sizes due to a loss in statistical power**.

This paper introduces the ididvar package. More information on the package is available on [its website](https://vincentbagilet.github.io/ididvar/).

<br>
